main event: Multiple sightings of a bright, metallic white, round, and clear object observed in the sky over Lake Erie, Put-in-Bay, Ohio. The object was seen to change colors from red, green, to blue, and exhibited erratic movement patterns including tilting, ascending, and descending.
interesting points: The object was observed by multiple witnesses in the same location at different times, with some witnesses reporting it appeared and disappeared, while others saw it changing colors and making sharp turns at high speeds.
The object was first observed around 9:30 PM, appeared brighter than any plane seen before, and faded away after changing colors multiple times.
The object was sighted on two separate occasions, displaying similar behavior and characteristics during both sightings.

Witnesses reported that the object did not behave like any conventional aircraft and seemed to hover or pause at times, and it was seen to change from a bright light to disappearing without any motion.

The area where the sightings occurred was observed carefully by experienced individuals who were familiar with airplane sightings, but none of them could identify the object as a conventional aircraft.
sighted object: Bright, metallic white, round and clear object that changed colors and exhibited erratic movement patterns including tilting, ascending, and descending.
witnesses: Multiple witnesses saw the object, some of whom saw it changing colors and making sharp turns at high speeds
photographs: No photographs were included in the report
